content:
To calculate the volume of a microwave in cubic feet, you can use the formula:

Volume (V) = Length (l) x Width (w) x Height (h)

If the length of the microwave is 15.75 inches, the width is 20.5 inches, and the height is 10.25 inches, you can calculate the volume as follows:

V = 15.75 x 20.5 x 10.25 = 3281.88 cubic inches

To convert the volume to cubic feet, you can divide it by the conversion factor of 1728 cubic inches per cubic foot:

V = 3281.88 cubic inches / 1728 cubic inches/cubic foot = 1.9 cubic feet

Thus, the volume of the microwave is approximately 1.9 cubic feet.

I hope this helps! If you have any additional questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
